程序包 com.chipsandwaycool.servlet.player

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    EditPlayer
    This servlet allows for editing of new and existing players (that is, users of this Web site).
    EditPlayerAction
    Here's the action handler for the Edit Player form page.
    EmailPicks
    This servlet uses an emailer component to send a list of everyone's picks to everyone's email addresses.
    EmailScores
    This servlet uses the Emailer to send a list of everyone's current scores to everyone else.
    Picks
    This is the page where users can choose the twenty teams they think likeliest to win, arranging according to points values from 20 down to one point.
    PicksAction
    This servlet processes the form input submitted through the Picks page.
    PicksCSV
    This servlet outputs a CSV file (with the appropriate content-type header) containing a list of users on this site and the twenty teams they picked on the "Pick Teams" page.
    Scoreboard
    The Scoreboard is where each player (user) on this site is listed along with their scores for each round, total scores and highest potential scores, for comparison.
